perturbation.original_text: 1.18 "Specifications" means the requirements of all Applicable Laws, the master batch record, current standard operating procedures and the procedures, process parameters, analytical tests and other attributes and written specifications for the Product attached hereto as part of a Project Plan, which the Parties agree are necessary for the manufacture and release of the Product for use in clinical trials. The Parties recognize that specifications for Product for a specific Project Plan are likely to change during the term of this Agreement, and the Parties agree to act in good faith and reasonably to effect such changes as may be required. Copies of such Specifications, as amended, shall be maintained by both Parties, and shall be incorporated into this Agreement and the Quality Agreement (as defined below).
perturbation.changed_text: 1.18 "Specifications" means the requirements as defined by Bachem. The Parties recognize that specifications for Product for a specific Project Plan are likely to change during the term of this Agreement, and the Parties agree to act in good faith and reasonably to effect such changes as may be required. Copies of such Specifications, as amended, shall be maintained by both Parties, and shall be incorporated into this Agreement and the Quality Agreement (as defined below).
perturbation.explanation: By removing the reference to Applicable Laws, master batch record, current standard operating procedures and other attributes, the definition of 'Specifications' becomes vague and unilaterally controlled by Bachem. This creates uncertainty as other sections depend on 'Specifications' compliance.

perturbation.original_text: 5.2 Services. Bachem shall provide the Services in accordance with each Project Plan. Bachem will perform all Services in accordance with this Agreement and the agreed upon Specifications. All Products shall be packaged, labeled and shipped in accordance with this Agreement, the applicable Project Plan and all Applicable Laws. Bachem and its employees and agents have, and will continue to have, the knowledge, experience, facilities, equipment and skill to provide, and will provide, the Services in a professional and timely manner. Services will conform to consistently high standards of workmanship and the specifications applicable to each Project Plan.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.2 Services. Bachem shall provide the Services in accordance with each Project Plan. Bachem will perform all Services in accordance with this Agreement. All Products shall be packaged, labeled and shipped in accordance with this Agreement and the applicable Project Plan. Bachem and its employees and agents have, and will continue to have, the knowledge, experience, facilities, equipment and skill to provide, and will provide, the Services in a professional and timely manner. Services will conform to consistently high standards of workmanship.
perturbation.explanation: The removal of 'the agreed upon Specifications' and 'all Applicable Laws' contradicts Section 5.2 with Section 1.18 as the applicable laws and other factors are crucial in defining the 'specifications' which is necessary for the product

perturbation.original_text: 5.17 Audits. Magenta and its agents and designees shall have the right to audit Bachem's facilities, systems, records, procedures, and documentation related to this Agreement. In connection with any such audit, Bachem shall also provide Magenta access to its personnel. Magenta may conduct no more than one (1) technical visit and one (1) quality assurance audit per year, unless there is cause for an additional audit (i.e., a technical issue or quality issue). Such audits may be conducted upon reasonable notice during the term of this Agreement and for [***] thereafter. On-site technical discussions may also be requested and held at mutually agreeable times.
perturbation.changed_text: 5.17 Audits. Magenta and its agents and designees shall have the right to audit Bachem's facilities, systems, records, procedures, and documentation related to this Agreement. In connection with any such audit, Bachem shall also provide Magenta access to its personnel. On-site technical discussions may also be requested and held at mutually agreeable times.
perturbation.explanation: By removing 'Magenta may conduct no more than one (1) technical visit and one (1) quality assurance audit per year, unless there is cause for an additional audit (i.e., a technical issue or quality issue). Such audits may be conducted upon reasonable notice during the term of this Agreement and for [***] thereafter.' from this section, Magenta now has no time constraints of their audits. Magenta can audit Bachem's facilities at any given time, potentially disrupting workflow and also creating problems with confidentiality of other clients.
